sentence: Trump himself has yet to weigh in on the race, though he has already waded into Ohio's midterms with an endorsement of his former aide Max Miller in the state's 13th Congressional District.
author: Elizabeth Elkind
title: Chaos at Ohio Senate race debate as Republican Josh Mandel shouts at audience member who said he should be 'put out' for calling BLM 'thugs' and calls his Democratic rival 'like AOC only dumber'

sentence: To that end, after considerable deliberation, I have decided to not seek re-election this year.” Gibbs was also facing Max Miller, a former aide to former President Donald Trump, in the Republican primary.
author: Clare Foran and Melissa Holzberg DePalo
title: Ohio GOP lawmaker announces retirement citing redistricting ‘circus’

sentence: During a late March fundraiser for Ohio GOP congressional candidate Max Miller, two donors and vocal supporters of Mandel put the hard-sell on Trump about endorsing him, according to a person who attended.
author: Rick Moran
title: Trump Plans Ohio Senate Endorsement in Crowded Field
